body:
Our two year old cat is called Snowy, she suffered a serious injury to her back legs

Our cat only has one options. The best option is to give surgery to her legs, this costs £2,000 to do so. We do not have that money around, therefore, if we can't do it we will need to put her down. 

We love our cat, she is two years old, we don't want her to be gone for our lives. 

Please, donate and save my cats life, for my family, she means the world to us.


http://www.youcaring.com/pet-expenses/we-need-money-for-a-surgery-to-save-my-cat-s-leg-and-life/2376...

replies.body:
Step 1: Add more information, people want to see an emotional bond they can relate with. Tell people more about the injury and what it will cost your cat and your family.

Step 2: Carry on spreading the word; post it anywhere you can and get help from popular friends.

Step 3: Save the cat and reward those who helped you.
